page.description: Returns the current or most recently used query for the specified table/set

argument.name: table_set
argument.description: The name of a table or set with the ".set" or ".dbf" extension.

page.discussion: Creates a CR-LF delimited list of the most recent values for query.filter, query.options, and query.order. MRU_QUERY() returns a pointer variable containing the most recent values for query.filter, query.flags, and query.order.
page.example: dim cs as P cs = mru_query("code.set") ? cs = filter = ACTION "" flags = "" order = "NAME + ACTION" ? cs.order = "NAME + ACTION"
